author: David Moore
title: Cowboys QB Dak Prescott played Eric Berry in Madden and thew up the X after scoring a TD
text:
Now reading the latest in Cowboys News This story is about Cowboys Published 1h Cowboys QB Dak Prescott played Eric Berry in Madden and thew up the X after scoring a TD This Story is About... Comment on This Story Houston Chronicle Dallas Cowboys quarterback Dak Prescott, right, taunts Kansas City Chiefs safety Eric Berry while playing Madden 17 at the EA Sports Bowl at Club Nomadic Thursday, Feb. 2, 2017 in Houston. (Michael Ciaglo / Houston Chronicle ) By David Moore , Staff Writer Contact David Moore on Twitter: @DavidMooreDMN 
Dak Prescott walked the red carpet Thursday evening in Houston for an EA Sports event. 
The Cowboys quarterback won't be playing in Sunday's game. But he did lead his team against safety Eric Berry and the Kansas City Chiefs in a Madden 17 tournament game at Club Nomadic. @dak throws up the X after long TD to Dez Bryant gives him early 14-0 lead in Madden tournament. pic.twitter.com/SN4SasX6lD â€” David Moore (@DavidMooreDMN) February 3, 2017 
"I'm always excited about competing, no matter if it's hamper ball, which you know we like to play in the Dallas locker room, or if it's Madden or if we're on a real football field,'' Prescott said. "I'm picking the Cowboys. I'm going to fee Zeke (Ezekiel Elliott), feed Dez (Bryant) and see how it goes.'' 
Prescott took an early lead against Berry, throwing up the X after his long touchdown pass to Bryant resulted in a 14-0 first half lead. On Saturday evening he will attend an awards event where either he or Elliott is expected to win Rookie of the Year. 
"I'm excited for all of the festivities and activities and everything I'm a part of,'' Prescott said. "I plan for it to be a great weekend.'' -- Listen live to Sportsradio The Ticket 1310am/96.7fm and rewind and pause up to 1 hour -- Free access to breaking news, analysis, podcasts and more New Android version soon!
